name: Keychron Q3 Max
description: Wireless TKL mechanical keyboard with 2.4GHz, Bluetooth 5.1, and wired modes. Features full aluminum body, QMK/VIA support, and programmable knob for ultimate customization.

reviews.review_text: TKL layout is perfect. Knob is surprisingly useful.
Triple connectivity means I use it everywhere.
Great keyboard but wish 2.4GHz dongle was smaller.
